cons: Improvement might be challenging since it is a start up

review_title: Great place to start out as an intern for software development
job_title: Fullstack Developer Intern in Terranova da Sibari
pros: Extramus provides good opportunities for beginners in the field of software development. It has a couple of active projects to keep you busy and you are given enough time to learn the required technologies and practice your skills. The location is also great in the heart of Calabria and near the ocean! Additionally, the work space is full of international students in interns from across the whole world which is a plus too!
cons: If you already have some solid experience with software development then Extramus might not be the place for you. Direction of the company projects can be unclear and you might be clueless about what to do with your time there. Office space could be more comfortable and have better lighting.
